ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Removed Maps and Savegames from the package and asset lists.
Fixed the file-drop in the Help and Logs not displaying all logs from a log report zip file.
Replaced the log level filter with a new slider.
Immproved the performance and search of the logs list.
Improved folder cleanup.
Fixed background service sometimes locking a file and causing the Skyve app to fail to log you in.
Added support for official assets.
Improved the peformance of content list views.
Improved the performance of image-heavy views.
Fixed stutters when in image-heavy views by deferring the loading of images to be completely off the main thread.
Relocated the cached thumbnails to

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added more restrictions and safeguards when changing the content location for the game to prevent users losing their data.
Added a visual window to let users know that the location change process is still ongoing.
Improved folder cleanup.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Backend improvements to reduce repeated calls to the PDX servers.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Moved the data cleanup to the skyve-app launch instead of game launch.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixed mods that have not yet received updates after their initial release causing an infinite reload when having their page open.
Enabled DEBUG logging during safe mode launch.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixed an issue with 'Safe Mode' not working.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added a 'Safe Mode' launch option in the Utilities page.
Fixed Dev Mode and UI Dev Mode being mixed up in the playset menu.
Save-games and Maps are no longer included in log reports' playset info.
Updated translations.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added the .cid file automatically when uploading a save-game.
Added a link button that can be sent to you using the review request replies.
Fixed getting multiple notifications about new comments during a long session.
Fixed getting a notification about new comments if it was 'you' that commented.

ChangeGroups.Name: Review Requests
Changes: You can now attach a save-game directly in your review request to better help us track down an issue. *This is optional.
If you have a pending review request, it will be shown while viewing a mod's compatibility information.
Skyve managers can now contact you on Skyve about your review request, letting you know if anything changed or if more information is needed.
You will now get a notification if anything new happens with your review request, or if the mod's compatibility data is changed.

ChangeGroups.Name: Comments
Changes: Added a 'New' tag on comments that you haven't read yet. *This is local only, Skyve does not know if you read the comments on the PDX Forumns.
Creators that have comments on their mods will get a notification when there's new comments that they haven't read yet.

ChangeGroups.Name: Other Changes
Changes: Added a button in the dashboard's new and recently updated mods sections to quickly jump to the PDX Mods tab with the selected tags and sorting.
Fixed thumbnails in the mod gallery and comments not working/showing correctly.
Fixed clicking on the attachment in the comments section not opening the image.

ChangeGroups.Name: Fixes
Changes: Crash fixes.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes & Fixes
Changes: Your last selected tags in the PDX Mods page are now remembered throughout your session.
Added a 'Disable Burst Compilation' launch option to the advanced playset launch options.
Fixed being able to import a playset by dropping a log report into the designated drop section.

ChangeGroups.Name: Fixes
Changes: Fixed not being able to properly update Skyve using an install location other than the default one.
Fixed the 'Unknown Publisher' popup when installing Skyve from the in-game button and in-app update button.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes & Fixes
Changes: Added a tag on comments that reflect the version number of the mod at the time of posting. The tag is shown in Green when the version is the latest one of the mod.
Added a link to the forum page of the mod if available.
Added Player-prev.log to the log report.
Fixed a case where users could not install Skyve properly.
Fixed a crash when jumping between tabs in the Mod Page.
Fixed the Skyve background service not getting installed.
Fixed compatibility info for 'Broken From Patch' not working as intended.

ChangeGroups.Name: New Additions
Changes: Added a new section in the Utilities tab that shows mods with issues, for example 'Out of date' mods. This section comes with a one-click button to fix all issues instantly.
Added 'Copy PDX Mods link as Markdown' to the copy section when right-clicking on a mod.
Added a more specific error message when launching Skyve with an incomplete configuration, letting users know they need to launch the game to complete the setup.

Added custom protocols that can be access to open pages in Skyve, as well as running specific actions using web URLs. For example:
• skyve-mod.com/app/mods/75804
• skyve-mod.com/app/logreport/save

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes & Fixes
Changes: Improved the single instance system, where launching Skyve will show up the already-running instance if available.
Log Report's Mod List now includes the mod's version.
Skyve version is now always automatically set to the latest version to keep users up to date.
Applied author colors to the dashboard mod sections.
Fixed the mod version not correctly updating after changing it.
Fixed compatibility report list showing mods that are not enabled.
Fixed image cache clearing going to the recycle bin instead of permanently getting deleted.

ChangeGroups.Name: User Changes
Changes: Added an automatic, unique color for users and authors throughout the app.
Added custom Avatars images for users and authors throughout the app.
Updated the user page with the Bio & Links that users have set up on PDX Mods.
Added a new setting in the Options to disable colored user names and avatars.

ChangeGroups.Name: Comments
Changes: Added a new 'Comments' section in the Mod Page.
You can directly reply and comment on mods from Skyve.
Use various formatting options with dedicated formatting buttons and shortcuts.
Easily track a conversation with color-coded user avatars

ChangeGroups.Name: Other Changes
Changes: You can now click the download notification to go to a mod's page. You can now also right-click to open up the right-click menu.
Improved log list performance.
Small UI performance improvements.
Fixed list views sometimes getting cut off at the end.

ChangeGroups.Name: Scrolling Changes
Changes: Updated the scrolling behavior of all 'large list' pages.
Scrolling is now on a standard scroll value instead of being index-based. This makes scrolling less jumpy and won't leave the bottom of the list empty.

Changed the scrolling behavior of the Log list to the new scrolling that's used by other large lists. This will help with performance and will allow you to scroll to the very end when there's a lot of items in the list.'
Fixed items sometimes jumping while scrolling in grid view.

ChangeGroups.Name: Out of date Changes
Changes: Mods in your current playset that do not match the latest version of the mod are now shown as 'Out of date' in the mod list, and on your dashboard.
Added a dropdown in the mod page where you can select a specific mod version.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Fixed not being able to see more than 100 mods in your playset.
Fixed mod links all showing as 'Website'.
Fixed mods getting a 'Source code not available' warning before the mod's information had even loaded.
Added new translations.

ChangeGroups.Name: Improvements & Fixes
Changes: Added missing icons for new PDX Mods links.
Added a cleanup process when launching the game through Skyve.
Improved the change-log grouping.
Fixed the enabled filter not working correctly.
Fixed some users not being able to launch the installer.
Fixed the update times not being in users' local time.
Fixed 'Copy mod name' in the right-click menu not working.

ChangeGroups.Name: Log Report Changes
Changes: Log report files now all have a 'username filter' to hide the sender's windows username.
Log report can now be imported to view the sender's active playset mods. This is done by drag-n-dropping the log report in the Playsets list page.
Added a log filter to hide useless warnings in the log.
Fixed not being able to import a log report in the Compatibility Report page if you do not have any issues listed.

ChangeGroups.Name: Hotfix
Changes: Fixed an error in the compatibility report page.
Fixed not being able to import playsets that include over 2GB of mods

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added an install button in the Options to allow re-installing or in case the button in the main menu is not showing up.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixed potential errors in the compatibility report.
Fixed not being able to right-click in the assets view.
The download notification now correctly goes away if a download fails.
Mod descriptions now scale properly on 4K displays.
Fixed the mods change-log tab showing 'All Versions' more than once.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added a setup screen when first installing Skyve to let users change the install location.
Load order is now handled automatically by Skyve.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixed a bug that kept refreshing information on the dashboard.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Fixes for non-english languages filtering by Tags in PDX Mods tab.
PDX Mods tab auto-load will now start before reaching the bottom

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Updated the PDX Mods browsing tab. Filters, sorting, responsiveness have been improved.
Mods hidden because of your playset's usage are now shown as very dim in the mods list instead.
Fixed the background service not updating mods.
Fixed global tags not showing up correctly.
Fixed tags filter not working.
Fixed launch not working for Gamepass users.

ChangeGroups.Name: Changes
Changes: Added tags to the PDX Mods showcase on the dashboard.
Stopping the game from Skyve now closes it normally so settings are saved properly by the game.
Launching the game with no active playset will show a prompt letting you know that no mods will be enabled.
Launching the game before the synchronization process ends will show a prompt asking if you'd like to launch automatically when it's done.
Fixed non-english languages showing the incorrect text if they haven't been translated.
